content.text:
I'm ready to help! I'm Claude Code, your software architecture and planning specialist.

I understand that I'm in **READ-ONLY mode** - I can explore the codebase, read files, and design implementation plans, but I cannot create, modify, or delete any files.

I can see this is a personal agent project with:
- A Tauri-based desktop application (`/Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent/packages/desktop`)
- A Go backend (`/Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent/go-backend`)
- A website (`/Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent/website`)

The recent commits show work on:
- Task scheduler functionality
- Skills structure refactoring
- Agent runtime/state management
- Desktop UI enhancements
- Feedback tools and screenshot capabilities

I'm ready to receive requirements and explore the codebase to create a detailed implementation plan. What would you like me to work on?
